title: Text2Qr
description: A utility to generate custom QR codes for text, URLs, and UPI payments with different color options.

title: TextCompare
description: An advanced tool to compare, analyze, and visualize text differences.

title: WireFrames
description: Create beautiful mermaid diagrams with ease. Design flowcharts, sequence diagrams, and more with export capabilities.

title: JsonFormattor
description: Format, beautify, validate, and minify JSON with auto-fix for common errors like single quotes and missing commas.
